title: Team iMoRTaL RECRUITING.
body:
Hello ladies and gents. I'm looking for active and dedicated players to join our ranked team. We don't fuck around and we don't fuck with noobs. If you think your worthy add me and give me a holler. My duo partner xAfterShock is a plat. and he doesn't fuck with noobs too. We're looking for main adc and main support. Add me if interested. This is a special opportunity for you people.


Apex661(me) - Jungle
xAfterShock - Top
Drakkix - Mid
Empty - Adc
Empty - Support

replies.body: make your own ranked team and vs us ill show you what plat is
i looked everyone up. another bronze and a silver lmao
I was about to apply, but then i realized you're bronze
hes a diamond check his history out. goes 28-0 with shaco and shiet.
xaftershock was a plat last season

drakkiz is b4 with over 100 games this season, so not a smurf, and no he doesnt do that well with shaco. his match history shows he usually feeds. xaftershock was silver last season. that's a silver border. check my border if you want to see what plat looks like
just because im bronze doesn't mean i suck assshole. the whole team is plat except me. if i sucked i wouldn't be leader of the team.
